description_html: NORTH, design by Arik Levy, is inspired by the balance of elegant, dynamic and adaptable. North allows the user to bring light to exactly where they want it. Two arms rise from the base to supply light where it is needed, with telescopic adjustable rods. The base is supplied with black stones as a weight. North has an LED light source and is available in four finishes: matte graphite lacquer, matte cream lacquer, matte blue lacquer and matte white lacquer.
